full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Medium Trucks with Insulated Aerial Devices

**Reference Number:** WS3577210410-Doc3712460637

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal

**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

## Tender Details

* **Tender Closing Date:** January 27, 2023, 14:00:00 EST
* **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
* **Procurement Category:** GD (Government Department)

## Description

We are seeking bids for the procurement of Medium Trucks with insulated Aerial Devices. Bidders are required to submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by January 27, 2023, by 14:00:00 EST. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

## Contracting Entity

The contracting entity responsible for this tender is:

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

This tender is open globally, with the delivery expected in Ottawa, Ontario.

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact:

* Desjardins, Roch (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [roch.desjardins@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:roch.desjardins@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
